## reload() function

Reloads user account data, if signed in.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function reload(user: externs.User): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  user | externs.[User](./auth-types.user.md) | The user. |

<b>Returns:</b>
